      • getTimeCardsForDateRange

        public static java.util.List<TimeCard> getTimeCardsForDateRange(java.util.List<TimeCard> timeCards,
                                                DateRange dateRange)
        Get a list of TimeCards that cover dates that fall within a date range. Each time may have time entries through out one week beginning with the time card start date.
        Parameters:
        timeCards - the list of time cards to extract the sub set from
        dateRange - The DateRange within which the dates of the returned TimeCards must fall.
        Returns:
        a list of TimeCards having dates fall within the date range.

      • getTimeCardsForConsultant

        public static java.util.List<TimeCard> getTimeCardsForConsultant(java.util.List<TimeCard> timeCards,
                                                 Consultant consultant)
        Get a list of TimeCards for the specified consultant.
        Parameters:
        timeCards - the list of time cards to extract the sub set from
        consultant - the consultant whose TimeCards will be obtained.
        Returns:
        a list of TimeCards for the specified consultant.
